website_summaries.verdict: This is a value pack that is priced much lower than genuine Makita batteries while possessing impressive power.
pros: Delivers impressive power when used in Makita power tools and holds charge well

customer_reviews.title: Good batteries, but I still needed to clean the corrosion off my screwgun contacts first.
customer_reviews.text: I have several Makita 9500 cordless drills that built houses & decks, so I was pleased to have them working again with new batteries! I did find it necessary to reach into the stock of the screwgun to remove some green corrosion on the contacts (I used the head of a long carriage bolt with a drop of solvent- because it was handy). Both new PWR+ batteries arrived with a charge and recharged nicely for a strong functioning gun. Now I can go build again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LESS THAN 1 YEAR AND DEAD
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my drill and less than a year later, neither will hold a charge. The one that I purchased from Batterys Plus in 2016 is still going strong. Don't buy these unless you want to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: ThePhilosophyProfessor

customer_reviews.title: Recharged and ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for batteries for my drill and have had no luck in our local hardware stores. I purchased this set about a month ago and have been very pleased!! Delivery was quick!! Batteries hold a great charge, I wish a found them years ago, instead of fighting to charge my original batteries!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New life for my drill
customer_reviews.text: Fit like the original, hold a charge. Without these, my Makita drill would be a paperweight. Buying batteries online seemed risky, but they're working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burton

customer_reviews.title: I have been completely satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: These batteries fit my old Makita driver perfectly. They arrived with a substantial charge on them and have taken a charge repeatedly using my original Makita charger. To date, I have been completely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KaronA

customer_reviews.title: Works in Makita drill.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in Makita drill. Came fully charged for immediate use.

customer_reviews.title: excellent fit.
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed for my older Mikita portable drill, arrived timely, excellent packaging. Very pleased with them.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts but really needed a new 7.2v battery. Charged them and they work great in my Makita hand trimmer. As good or better than the original.
customer_reviews.author: RRtracker

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find these!
customer_reviews.text: Batteries had a good charge already or they charged in a short period of time. Haven't put them to use yet but feel they were a good buy and delivery was fast and efficient. I love my little Makita drill and was afraid that I wouldn't be able to get replacement batteries. So happy to get them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, exactly as described and works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, exactly as described and works great. Fast delivery and would recommend to anyone looking for that style battery.

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine so far. Would give a 5 star but haven't product that much yet.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it for an extended project yet but so far looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected out of the box. Haven't used it for an extended project yet but so far looks good.

customer_reviews.title: Fine so far
customer_reviews.text: They seem to charge up fully quickly. We will have to wait to comment on how long the power will stay.
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Makita 7000 Battery Combo
customer_reviews.text: These are great replacement for your old Makita 7000 batteries. They charge up just find on the Makita charger in about two hours, and they fix perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. King

customer_reviews.title: Small Hand held power drill driver
customer_reviews.text: Could not find the batteries for my small Makita power drill anywhere after the original ones wouldn't hold a charge. Ordered the twin pack at a great price and they charged up perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: More life to my Makita
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Makita 9.6 volt system since 1998 and have replaced the batteries before. The last time one Makita battery cost me around $32. So this price for a replacement battery this is a real deal. I can tell no difference in the performance of this battery.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: working as described only have used this week good battery

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works as described. Perfect replacement for my old batteries. Also very speedy delivery!

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement battery!
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement battery for my old faithful Makita drill. I also used them with a Makita trimmer. They have amazing capacity and fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit
customer_reviews.text: The quality service and appropriate fit for my application was actually surprising. The batteries hold a charge well. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, holds the charge very good. I will order again if I ever need them.
customer_reviews.author: Danny L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. This is what I wanted and this is what I got. Perfect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These batteries do not hold a charge as long as the original battery, but work for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New life for old drill
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Ni Cad batteries! I've had my Makita drill for over 25 years. The batteries that came with it wouldn't hold a charge so I tried these. I can't believe the power these batteries gave my old 9 volt drill. I was able to drill with ease 3 1/2" lag screws into a hard wood post for a wood duck nest I was attaching. Didn't even need my husband's help! I thought I needed a new drill but now my old Makita is very powerful with these new batteries! Love these batteries and my Makita.
customer_reviews.author: Shadowbrook

customer_reviews.title: Bought for work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work and nobody has had any complaints, so they must be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Wall

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement ! Value/Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit right,in the original 9700A charger too. Ready to go out of box,nice sealed packaging.Makita drill and flashlight working great!
customer_reviews.author: pgp

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Battery packs work well. Holds it's charge. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: and seem to be fine. I haven't used them much as yet
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived as promised, and seem to be fine. I haven't used them much as yet, so we'll see how they last.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Found old Makita drill that had dead battery. These are working great.

customer_reviews.title: Batteries didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: The batteries didn’t work. I “charged” them and they didn’t power my drill.
customer_reviews.author: disgruntled

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found them
customer_reviews.text: So far they work well. Ready to use right out of the box. Glad I found them.....I almost junked my drill because I couldn't find batteries until I found the on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Capponi

customer_reviews.title: Am very pleased with their performance
customer_reviews.text: They hold a charge a long time. Am very pleased with their performance.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and was shipped super fast. Also very affordable price

product_meta.title: Pwr+ 2 Pack 9.6v Ni-cd 2100mah Makita 9000 9033 192696-2 632007-4 Battery Replacement
product_meta.description:
Pwr+ Platinum Guarantee

 * Pwr+ products are CE/FCC/RoHS certified.
* Warranty: 30 Days Money Back Guarantee / 1 Year - Free Exchange (Pwr+ pays for shipping) / Please contact us with any questions or concerns - we are here to help! (Phone service is available)
* Products trademarked Pwr+ are marketed and sold exclusively by Pwr+. We focus on providing quality power products and excellent customer service ... and we also ship your order the same or next day (Amazon order processing time varies) ! 
* Watch out for Cheap High Capacity Batteries (Label Capacity is 2Ah - True Capacity is 1Ah) 

High Quality Replacement for Makita 4093D, 4093DW, 4190D, 4190DB, 4190DW, 4190DWD, 4300D, 4300DW, 4390D, 4390DW, 5090D, 5090DW, 6012HD, 6012HDL, 6012HDW, 6092D, 6092DW, 6093D, 6093DW, 6094D, 6094DW, 6095D, 6095DW, 6095DWBE, 6095DWDE, 6095DWE, 6095DWL-2, 6096D, 6096DW, 6096DWBE, 6096DWE, 6096DWLE, 6891D, 6891DW, 6900D, 6900DW, 8400D, 8400VD, 8400VDW, 8402DW, 8402VD, 8402VDW, 903D, 903DW, DA390D, DA390DW, DA391D, DA391DRA, DA391DW, DA391DWB, DA391DWD, ML900 (Flashlight), ML902 (Flashlight), T220D, T220DW, UM1690D, UM1691D

Compatible Part Numbers / Models: 191681-2, 192533-0, 632007-4, 9000, 9001, 9002, 9033, 9600 and others 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS:

Capacity: 2.1Ah
